00032 
00033   size_t encoded_length_dir_entry(const DirEntry &dir_entry) {
00034     return 1 + encoded_length_vstr(dir_entry.name);
00035   }
00036 
00037   void encode_dir_entry(uint8_t **bufp, const DirEntry &dir_entry) {
00038     encode_bool(bufp, dir_entry.is_dir);
00039     encode_vstr(bufp, dir_entry.name);
00040   }
00041 
00042   DirEntry &
00043   decode_dir_entry(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp,
00044                          DirEntry &dir_entry) {
00045     HT_TRY("decoding dir entry",
00046       dir_entry.is_dir = decode_bool(bufp, remainp);
00047       dir_entry.name = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp));
00048     return dir_entry;
00049   }
00050 }
